Label.en: Much of Paris used to rest on rich deposits of limestone, and so extensive mining tunnels were dug in medieval times!
Label.fr: Much of Paris used to rest on rich deposits of limestone, and so extensive mining tunnels were dug in medieval times!
Label.es: Much of Paris used to rest on rich deposits of limestone, and so extensive mining tunnels were dug in medieval times!
Label.zh: Much of Paris used to rest on rich deposits of limestone, and so extensive mining tunnels were dug in medieval times!

Label.en: Unfortunately, the methods used at that time were rather unsafe...
Label.fr: Unfortunately, the methods used at that time were rather unsafe...
Label.es: Unfortunately, the methods used at that time were rather unsafe...
Label.zh: Unfortunately, the methods used at that time were rather unsafe...

Label.en: As a result, when buildings started to be developed on the ground above the mines, collapses occurred…
Label.fr: As a result, when buildings started to be developed on the ground above the mines, collapses occurred…
Label.es: As a result, when buildings started to be developed on the ground above the mines, collapses occurred…
Label.zh: As a result, when buildings started to be developed on the ground above the mines, collapses occurred…

Label.en: Once the mines were depleted, the tunnels lost their primary purpose!
Label.fr: Once the mines were depleted, the tunnels lost their primary purpose!
Label.es: Once the mines were depleted, the tunnels lost their primary purpose!
Label.zh: Once the mines were depleted, the tunnels lost their primary purpose!

Label.en: Fortunately, they became useful again in the 18th century, when Paris’ cemeteries began to overflow
Label.fr: Fortunately, they became useful again in the 18th century, when Paris’ cemeteries began to overflow
Label.es: Fortunately, they became useful again in the 18th century, when Paris’ cemeteries began to overflow
Label.zh: Fortunately, they became useful again in the 18th century, when Paris’ cemeteries began to overflow

Label.en: The tunnels were the ideal venue to dump a whole load of bones! 6 million bodies’ worth, in fact!
Label.fr: The tunnels were the ideal venue to dump a whole load of bones! 6 million bodies’ worth, in fact!
Label.es: The tunnels were the ideal venue to dump a whole load of bones! 6 million bodies’ worth, in fact!
Label.zh: The tunnels were the ideal venue to dump a whole load of bones! 6 million bodies’ worth, in fact!

Label.en: A practical solution, in my view!
Label.fr: A practical solution, in my view!
Label.es: A practical solution, in my view!
Label.zh: A practical solution, in my view!

Label.en: A practical solution, in my view!
Label.fr: A practical solution, in my view!
Label.es: A practical solution, in my view!
